mapper.select: /* 호출ID : selectMenuList - 메뉴 리스트 불러오기 */ SELECT MENU_ID ,UPPR_MENU_ID ,MENU_NAME ,WRITER_ID ,ORDR ,INSRT_DT ,UPDT_DT FROM MENU START WITH UPPR_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = UPPR_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY ORDR
/* 호출ID :selectMenuDetail - 메뉴 상세페이지 불러오기 */ SELECT MENU_ID ,UPPR_MENU_ID ,MENU_NAME ,WRITER_ID ,ORDR ,INSRT_DT ,UPDT_DT FROM MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.update: /* 호출ID : updateMenu - 메뉴 수정하기 */ UPDATE MENU SET UPPR_MENU_ID = #{upprMenuId}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, WRITER_ID = #{writerId}, ORDR = #{ordr}, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
